entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
